TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PageHandlerFactory extends System.Object implements class System.Web.IHttpHandlerFactory

summary.span: 建立繼承自 類別並實作 介面之類別的執行個體。

span.span: Creates instances of classes that inherit from the class and implement the interface.

summary.span: 執行個體是動態建立，可以處理 ASP.NET 檔案的要求。

span.span: Instances are created dynamically to handle requests for ASP.NET files.

summary.span: 類別是 ASP.NET 網頁的預設處理常式 Factory 實作。

span.span: The class is the default handler factory implementation for ASP.NET pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作介面，以提供 ASP.NET 檔案的預設 HTTP 處理常式。The class implements the interface to provide the default HTTP handler for ASP.NET files. 呼叫 ASP.NET 編譯系統來進行編譯，如有必要，並傳回精確的型別對應至的 URL，並接著會建立該類型的執行個體。The calls the ASP.NET compilation system to compile, if necessary, and return the exact type corresponding to the URL, and then creates an instance of that type. 頁面類型繼承自類別並實作介面。The page type inherits from the class and implements the interface. 若要建置的自訂頁面處理常式 factory 實作，並註冊自訂中的應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中類別[httpHandlers 項目 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24ca01f3-7141-4fdc-acac-71c0733cf6c2)組態一節。To build a custom page handler factory, implement the and register the custom class in the Web.config file for the application in the [httpHandlers Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24ca01f3-7141-4fdc-acac-71c0733cf6c2) configuration section.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式的預設建構函式，會初始化為其預設值的任何欄位。The constructor is the default constructor and initializes any fields to their default values.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.IHttpHandler GetHandler (System.Web.HttpContext context, string requestType, string virtualPath, string path);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.IHttpHandler GetHandler(class System.Web.HttpContext context, string requestType, string virtualPath, string path) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetHandler (context As HttpContext, requestType As String, virtualPath As String, path As String) As IHttpHandler
public: virtual System::Web::IHttpHandler ^ GetHandler(System::Web::HttpContext ^ context, System::String ^ requestType, System::String ^ virtualPath, System::String ^ path);

abstract member GetHandler : System.Web.HttpContext * string * string * string -> System.Web.IHttpHandler override this.GetHandler : System.Web.HttpContext * string * string * string -> System.Web.IHttpHandler

param.name: context
param.span: 類別的執行個體，提供對內建伺服器物件 (例如，Request、Response、Session 和 Server) 的參考，用以服務 HTTP 要求。

span.span: An instance of the class that provides references to intrinsic server objects (for example, Request, Response, Session, and Server) used to service HTTP requests.

param.name: requestType
param.span: 用戶端使用的 HTTP 資料傳輸方法 (GET 或 POST)。

span.span: The HTTP data transfer method (GET or POST) that the client uses.

param.name: virtualPath
param.span: 所要求之資源的虛擬路徑。

span.span: The virtual path to the requested resource.

param.name: path
param.span: 所要求之資源的 屬性。

span.span: The property to the requested resource.

summary.span: 傳回 介面的執行個體，以處理所要求的資源。

span.span: Returns an instance of the interface to process the requested resource.

returns.span: 會處理要求的新 ，否則為 。

span.span: A new that processes the request; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由 ASP.NET 執行階段呼叫，並傳回的有效執行個體介面或`null`。The method is called by the ASP.NET run time and returns either a valid instance of the interface or `null`.

summary.span: 允許 Factory 重複使用現有的處理常式執行個體。

span.span: Enables a factory to reuse an existing instance of a handler.
